Title: January 2011
Content: 22*n37963a02224* *(b) (i) discuss, with reasons, the conditions of temperature and pressure that would favour the production of hydrogen in reaction 1.  you should consider the effect of the conditions on both yield and rate.(7)  (ii) excess steam is used in reaction 1.  state why an excess of a reagent is used and suggest why steam, rather than methane, is chosen.(2)
